setScoreArrayValues(Integer) - Method in class com.mygdx.mainpackage.Screens.GameOverScreen
This function alters the scoreArray in order for the values of the array be the score numbers in the correct spaces (the score must have 9 number being that the unused spaces to the left are zeroes) The printNumber function is called to print each of the 9 numbers
